This pause will cost you </outline></c><color=#811918>${##}</c><color=#fff0d6><outline color=#811918 width=3>.</outline></c>

<outline color=#811918><color=#fbe9cd>MATCH THE ENDS OF DOMINOES.







           MAKE 2 ENDS OF THE BOARD
                THE SAME TO SCORE.
</c></outline>


<size=37><color=#feca00>
       TIPS:
       ATTACHING A DOMINO WITH
       2 IDENTICAL ENDS CAN 
       ALSO SCORE.</c></size>
TIPS: DOMINOES WITH THE SIGNS WILL DOUBLE OR TRIPLE THE SCORE.

<outline color=#811918> <color=#fbe9cd>DRAW FROM THE BONEYARD
UNTIL YOU CAN CONTINUE.
</c></outline>

<outline color=#811918><color=#fbe9cd>WHEN YOU BEAT THE COMPUTER, 
             YOU WILL TAKE THE POINTS OF
             THEIR REMAINING DOMINOES 
              AND START THE NEXT ROUND.</c></outline>
















        <size=37><color=#feca00>TIPS:
         SCORE IS DETERMINED BY TOTAL POINTS.</c></size>

<outline color=#811918><color=#fbe9cd>GAMES ARE FINISHED WHEN
                 <color=#feca00>· </c> ${##} ROUNDS ARE COMPLETE
                 <color=#feca00>· </c>TIME'S UP

              YOUR GAME         THEIR GAME 

              <size=30><color=#ffffff>YOU     COMPUTER       THEY   COMPUTER</c></size>







             <size=60><outline color=#811918 width=4><color=#feca00>WINNER!</c></outline></size>
        BEAT YOUR OPPONENTS BY SCORING
        HIGHER IN GAMES VS THE COMPUTER.
</c></outline>
                    <size=35>TIME BONUS CALCULATION:</size>



         <size=30><color=#feca00>TIPS:
          YOU WILL GET AN ADDED TIME BONUS SCORE WHEN
          YOU COMPLETE GAMES FAST.</c></size>
